data.description:
GRAB is a multiplayer parkour game. Climb, jump, slide and swing through the levels to reach the end, but don't fall or touch the lava!
A core component of GRAB is the level editor that lets you and your friends create your own levels together and upload them for everyone else to play.

Features:
- Active and fun physics based controls
- Play with up to 12 players in cross platform multiplayer
- Built-in level editor that lets you build levels together with your friends in multiplayer with quick switching between testing and editing
- Download levels made by the community and upload your own
- OVER 350000 Community levels! More every day!

GRAB is currently in EARLY ACCESS! This means that while it is already fun to play, it is far from finished. A lot of planned features are still missing or incomplete and there may be some bugs and crashes.

changelog.change_log: - Santa reached out to me, expressing a rather urgent concern that Christmas might be at risk of cancellation should I not revert the textures to their original state. It seems that their calendar is uniquely tailored to count only the days leading up to Christmas, leaving them oblivious to the concept of April Fools' Day. Considering the gravity of the situation, I concluded that heeding Santa's advice would be the wisest course of action.

- Fixed a crash that could happen when reporting a level.
- Changed the color block texture to be more neutral.
- After a lot of careful consideration I decided that it's best to switch back to the old textures.

- More crash fixes.
- The game now shows the server error if publishing a level fails, indicating the reason.
- Removed "Low Effort" level report option.
- When trying to publish a level the server now checks the level for profanity and complexity (minimum is 10!).
- Please let me know if you run into cases that the server prevents even though they should be fine!

- New time limited easter checkpoint.
- 5 eggs have been hidden in the lobby, each one is worth 10 coins!
- Fixed a crash that prevented some players from playing.

- New time limited easter checkpoint.
- 5 eggs have been hidden in the lobby, each one is worth 10 coins!
- Fixed a crash that prevented some players from playing.

- Added GRAB Coins!
- Updated the store layout, giving a bit more visibility to cosmetic packs.
- You can now claim 50 GRAB Coins for free every week!
- Added occlusion culling for all levels (but not in the editor yet) to improve performance in some cases.

- Added GRAB Coins!
- Updated the store layout, giving a bit more visibility to cosmetic packs.
- You can now claim 50 GRAB Coins for free every week!
- Added occlusion culling for all levels (but not in the editor yet) to improve performance in some cases.

- Animation tools are now available for everyone! (You may encounter weird or missing collisions if things move fast, expect glitches to be fixed in the future and please don't rely on them for your levels!)

- New Lobby.
- New wild west cosmetics pack.
- Made getting crushed by animated blocks more reliable.
- Changed networked data layout to better handle changes to animations.

- Improved collision behavior between fast moving player and static objects.
- The calculation of how far down you have to fall to respawn now accounts for animations.
- Fixed in-game music not playing.
- Fixed creating a checkpoint with the thumbstick not updating the number of checkpoints in the pause menu if it was opened.
- Fixed a crash that could happen when adding your favorite levels to the playlist.
- Fixed a crash that could happen if due to connection errors cosmetics data failed loading.
- Disabled snow particles in the main menu.

- Improved collision behavior between fast moving player and static objects.
- The calculation of how far down you have to fall to respawn now accounts for animations.
- Fixed in-game music not playing.
- Fixed creating a checkpoint with the thumbstick not updating the number of checkpoints in the pause menu if it was opened.
- Fixed a crash that could happen when adding your favorite levels to the playlist.
- Fixed a crash that could happen if due to connection errors cosmetics data failed loading.
- Disabled snow particles in the main menu.

- Fixed jumping on overlapping blocks and a bunch of other cases that were a bit broken before.
- Fixed holding on with both hands while on a rotating block allowing players to move away from the block while still holding on to it.
- Fixed a crash that could happen when publishing a level.
- Fixed several common crashes.
- Integrated Modulate's ToxMod system to automatically monitor public lobbies for potential voice chat toxicity, ensuring a more respectful environment.
- Integrated Modulate's ToxMod system to automatically monitor public lobbies for potential voice chat toxicity, ensuring a more respectful environment.

- New lobby!
- New cosmetics!
- Player positions are now networked relative to whatever they are moving with, reducing the perceived lag on moving objects a lot.
- Fixed falling when walking over small gaps.
- Fixed problems when falling off animated ice.
- Reduced problems when walking on rotating blocks.
- Fixed falling to the ground on animated objects moving down too fast.
- Improved falling off rotating objects when holding on with two hands.
- Fixed holding on with both hands while standing on an animated slope not correctly moving the player with it.
- Maybe fixed a common crash that could happen when setting a level image.

- We have a new EULA and Privacy Policy! The game will prompt you to agree to the new EULA on the first start. Please carefully read and understand these documents!
- I also put together community guidelines which you can find below the player list when in-game! They are by no means complete, but provide a general idea on how to behave in GRAB.
- Moved the "Lock All" and global undo and redo buttons to the left side.
- Added a "Mute All" button on the top right of the player list.

- If gravity blocks overlap, only the smallest one will now affect the player.
- Fixed all server requests failing after playing for a while.
- Fixed automatic no leg mode detection replacing blocks from the previous level with gravity blocks in the new level.

- Improved automatic no leg mode detection (it should be much less aggressive now).
- Fixed moving yourself into a no legs mode area while holding on with both hands losing all your momentum.
- Fixed pushing off with one hand while grappling with the other not giving any momentum from the push.
- Fixed checkpoints not working in no legs mode.
- Fixed checkpoint count on the watch when verifying levels.
